titleStmt.title: An excellent ballad, of a prince of England's courtship to the King of France's daughter, and how the prince was disasterously slain; and how the aforesaid princess was afterwards married to a forrester. To the tune of, Crimson velvet, &c.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for Alex. Milbourn, and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-Bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
